name: Long Live the Empress II: Dragon Master
storyline: This is your second story in Long Live the Empress. Peace is finally here in Heath. You, the empress, are living in bliss with your loved one, until foreigners bring you disaster... The dragon wakes from its long slumber, and a crisis engulfs the continent. Can you overcome this trial and save both your loved one and your empire?
summary:
Long Live the Empress S2: Dragon Master is an original maybe series.
Long Live the Empress S2: Dragon Master is the second book of the Long Live the Empress series.
